message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $60.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $60 is quite low, but I'm willing to come down to $100 for you.  This product is truly worth it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a little closer on the price.  I'm still interested, but to make this work for me I'd need it to be around $75.
